TEXT.TITLE: CELLULAR COMMUNICATIONS INC <COMM> NINE MTHS
TEXT.BODY: Dec 31 end Shr loss 1.26 dlrs vs loss six cts Net loss 11.4 mln vs loss 400,000 Revs 12.5 mln vs 4,049,000 NOTEL Company changed fiscal year to December 31 end. Prior year net includes gain 4,454,031 dlrs from sale of minority interests in Connecticut partnerships. Reuter
